name: Dodge The Box!
description:
After 48(ish) hours of work, I was finally able to put this thing together for Ludum Dare 39.  It's nothing great but here's the main premis.  Avoid getting hit in the head by falling boxes and grab batteries to keep your jetpack charged!

Twitter - @Xeinix

Instagram - @XeinixOfficial

Engine - Unity

Sound Effects - sfxr

Artwork - Photoshop CS6

Programming - C# with Visual Studio Community 2017

Anything made after 2005 should work. Not like this game is too graphicly intencive or anything.
